sentences.english: I didn't have the speed at all on the greens.
sentences.chinese: 我根本不能再果嶺上提起速度。

sentences.english: Two greens again, ask your caddy for yardage.
sentences.chinese: 呢處又繫有兩個果嶺，要碼數清楚最好問球僮。

sentences.english: The uniform of green speed on the Willow golf course was worse in Spring.
sentences.chinese: 高爾夫球場果嶺球速春季比夏季和秋季較慢。

sentences.english: Avoid stepping on adversary's ball and altering competitor's line of putt.
sentences.chinese: 在果嶺是應避免踏越對方球員的球，及進球路線。

sentences.english: The green is behind the grove.
sentences.chinese: 這是右狗腿洞，果嶺在那片樹林後面。

sentences.english: The tees, landing areas and greens are all placed away from where runoff will collect.
sentences.chinese: 發球臺，落點區，果嶺都要遠離會被沖刷的區域。

sentences.english: Multiple-level greens have their place and are quite effective when used properly.
sentences.chinese: 多層果嶺有其地位，同時用的好會讓人印象深刻。

sentences.english: It was a tough walk because the green was higher than the tee.
sentences.chinese: 他走得非常艱難，因爲果嶺要比發球處地勢高些。

sentences.english: A player plays from just off the putting green with the flagstick in the hole.
sentences.chinese: 當旗杆還在球洞裏的時候，一名球員從果嶺上打球。

sentences.english: The difficulty is heavy , especially the undulation on the green, it is easy to get three putting.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的果嶺難度很大，起伏特別大，很容易三推。

sentences.english: The green slopes upward from front to back.
sentences.chinese: 果嶺斜坡從前至後向上延伸。

sentences.english: Middle of the green will usually end up with 2 putts .
sentences.chinese: 果嶺中間是個不錯的目標，可以2推進洞。

sentences.english: Mowing height and mowing type had magnificent different on affect green speed.
sentences.chinese: 修剪高度和修剪方式對果嶺球速的影響均極顯著。

sentences.english: The green is large and well bunkered, so be sure and take aim at the right spot.
sentences.chinese: 果嶺很大，又被大沙坑包圍着，要確信朝右邊瞄準。

sentences.english: The green, pinched in the front by the penetrating bunkers, angles away from the golfers approach.
sentences.chinese: 通過滲透式沙坑擠壓在前方的果嶺進行近距離切球。

sentences.english: Also refers to one of the nine or eighteen areas between the tee and the green.
sentences.chinese: 也指球座和果嶺之間九個或十八個區域中的一個。
